constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 46 (Thursday, March 11, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Miss RICE of New York:
H.R. 1849.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section VIII
[Page H1358]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: To authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services, acting through the Director of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention, to establish a core public health infrastructure program, and for other purposes.
